channel.title: SFoL 29 - Blender v. 2.0 - (3/23) - Game end
channel.description:
## Blender - Hosted by @eevee and cohosted by @Sylveon (vote count bot made by me) and @Marluxion (vote count bot of unknown origin) and @orangeandblack5 (not a vote count bot, but still a bot)
### General rules 1. Follow this rules: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515 2. Respect the host and the players. 3. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. if you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 4. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 5. Do not screenshot private host messages. 6. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose. 7. Refrain from posting many times in a row. 8. Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours.
### Executions 1. To accuse someone say "**/accuse [full player name]**" or "**/vote [full player name]**" 2. Votes saying Guilty or Not Guilty before the target is on the stand will not be counted. 3. Should the votes reach the majority, that player will go on trial. They can say a defence, and the rest of the players must vote **"/Guilty"** or **/Not Guilty"** on the thread. 4. Players can discuss while the target is on trial. 5. No one is able to use day powers when a trial is in session. The Only exception is the king’s Decide Fate. 6. The day timer does not stop when the target is on trial. 7. If the day timer runs out before a total majority is hit, the option with the most votes is what happens to the target.
### Picking a New King 1. When the king dies 24 hours is given for any player with royal blood to step up and take the throne. 2. After that 24 hours, anyone is free to step up. 3. If only 1 person steps up when the day ends that person becomes the king 4. If 2 people step forward everyone votes on who should be the next king. Whoever has the most votes at the end of the day becomes the king. If the votes are tied whoever stepped up 1st becomes the king 5. **King does NOT lose the old class when elected. They only gain additional abilities: Royal Finger, Decide Fate and Guard!**
[details="King "bonus" rolecard"] ![image|690x276](upload://9z2qQEWMaoMe8nYpzMGJhMBy7nI.png) [/details]
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want. **There is no limit to the number of people who can participate in this game.**
## Game specific rules: [epic voice on] _Adiart under siege! Old sworn enemies must cooperate to defeat the enemy from the outside. M̶a̶s̶t̶e̶r̶ ̶y̶o̶d̶a̶ King decided to close the gates, but assassins sent by the D̶a̶r̶t̶h̶ ̶V̶a̶d̶e̶r̶ Demwir Castle has long infiltrated the castle. Adiart citizens have once again decided to trust in their skills of finding liars. All in name of defending their land._ [epic voice off]
### Gameplay:
1. All classes from Class Thread (except kings) are available, but their FACTION will be randomised. Due to that, they will have small balance changes introduced. (ex. Neutral Observer, Adiart Possessor etc.) 2. Invaders and Neutrals can demand the role card for any faction and class, due to fakeclaim reasons. Adiart members don't have such a possibility. 3. Invaders have a factional, assigned night kill. 4. Faction and/or Alignment conversion mechanics may or may not be present in the game. 5. Full role card is flipped on death. 6. All unique classes are unique within own FACTION. Meaning there could be 2 unique classes if they are of a different FACTION. (ex. Adiart Prince and Neutral Prince may roll in the same game).
**Adiart wincon:** Your objective is to Eliminate the Demwir Invasion, and any Neutrals who stand against you. **Demwir Invaders wincon:** Your objective is to Eliminate Adiart and any Neutrals who stand against you
### Living players: 1. htm 2. ~~Memesky~~ - [color=blue] Adiart Physician[/color] - Dead night 1 3. ~~Livicus~~ - [color=blue] Adiart [/color][color=purple] Poacher [/color] - Dead night 2 4. ~~Firekitten~~ - [color=blue] Adiart [/color][color=purple] Herbalist [/color] - Dead night 4 5. Damafaud 6. ~~Margaret~~ - - [color=blue] Adiart [/color][color=purple] Nightwatch [/color] - Dead night 2 7. ~~Hippolytus~~ - [color=Grey]Neutral[/color] [color=blue] Hunter [/color] - Lynched day 3 8. ~~PoisonedSquid~~ - [color=blue] Adiart Knight [/color] - Dead night 3 9. ~~Maximus Prime~~ - Spiritualist - Dead night 1 10. ~~Blizer~~ - [color=blue] Adiart Maid [/color] - Lynched day 1 11. Sarun 12. ~~Psychoneirik~~ - [color=blue] Adiart Butler [/color] - Lynched day 4 13. Moleland 14. ~~Nuclear~~ - [color=blue] Adiart [/color][color=purple] Herbalist [/color] - Dead night 1 15. Marluxion 16. Marcus_Doodalee 17. Insanity 18. ~~Pug~~ - Spiritualist - Dead night 1 19. ~~PokemonKidRyan~~ - [color=green] Demwir [/color][color=pink] Fool [/color] - Lynched day 5 20. ~~Captain~~ - - [color=blue] Adiart [/color][color=purple] Sage [/color] - Dead night 3 21. ~~Frostwolf~~ - [color=green] Demwir [/color][color=blue] Knight [/color] - Dead night 1 22. ~~Sketch~~ - [color=blue] Adiart [/color][color=green] Druid [/color] - Dead night 1 23. ~~Sam17z~~ -> ~~Luxy~~ - [color=blue] Adiart Noble [/color] - Dead night 3
### Time stamps:
Day 2 start - https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-29-blender-v-2-0-16-23-day-2/70247/4007

Mate, they want to take Revenant’s soulmate with PKR which that was the plan.

But HTM used Decide Fate too soon.

Yep, and that would mean ending the revenant.

Acctualy revenant has a serious problems in situations like that.
They can’t actualy prevent theirs target from dying to knights, hunters, ect. ect.

They can’t act for their’s soulmate bad plays.
